content: आसंग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Uninterrupted, perpetual. --गः {@--1@} Attachment, devotion (to any object) (to enjoy or protect it); सुख° लुब्धः <ls>K. 173</ls>; <ls>U. 3</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 60.</ls> {@--2@} Intentness, close application. {@--3@} Contact, adnerence, clinging; (पंकजं) सशैवलासंगमपि प्रकाशते <ls>Ku. 5. 9</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">3. 46</ls>; व्रततिवलयासंगसंजातपाशः <ls>Ś. 1. 33</ls>; <ls>Mu. 1. 14</ls>; अनासंगः absence of consolation; <ls>Māl. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Association, connection, union; त्यक्त्वा कर्मफलासंगं <ls>Bg. 4. 20</ls>; so कांतासंग &c. {@--5@} Fixing, fastening to. {@--6@} Pride about the authorship of a thing (कर्तृत्वाभिमान). {@--7@} That which is fastened; <ab>cf.</ab> उत्तरासंग. {@--8@} Waylaying (?). --गं A kind of fragrant earth; (सौराष्ट्रमृत्तिका). --गं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Without interruption, eternally.
